item.title: Who Wants to Become a Heat-Pump Billionaire?
item.description: Heat pumps are quickly becoming a popular solution for reducing carbon emissions, and according to a Bloomberg report, they could also be a lucrative investment opportunity for those looking to profit from the energy transition. The report by Chris Bryant^1^ discusses the growing demand for heat pumps, which are devices that use electricity to move heat from one place to another, thereby heating or cooling a space.
